heroSection.title: About Sunbrix
heroSection.subtitle: Building dreams with trust, quality, and innovation. We're here to make your home-building journey seamless and stress-free.

storySection.title: Our Story
paragraphs: It all starts with a dream, a dream searching for freedom, purpose, and a place where you truly belong. A place where imagination takes shape, where memories are built, and where generations feel proud. A place you call home.
We listen, understand, and connect deeply with your vision. Through thoughtful design, planning and craftsmanship, we shape every space with intention.

valuesSection.title: Our Values
valuesSection.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

values.title: Quality First
values.description: We use only certified-grade materials and work with trusted professionals to ensure the highest standards.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear pricing, regular updates, and no hidden surprises. You'll know exactly what to expect at every step.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We leverage technology and modern construction methods to deliver better homes faster and more efficiently.

values.title: Customer Focus
values.description: Your vision is our priority. We work closely with you to ensure your dream home becomes reality.

metaContent.meta_title: About Sunbrix - Premium Home Construction Services
metaContent.meta_description: Learn about Sunbrix's commitment to quality home construction. Building dreams with trust, quality, and innovation since 1999.
